name: Jawan
info: A high-octane action thriller that outlines the emotional journey of a man who is set to rectify the wrongs in society.

name: Kushi
info: A couple who are predicted to have a failed marriage, decide to become ideal partners for each other. Will it work out or will they realize that their parents were right?

name: Mark Antony
info: Mark, a skilled mechanic and the son of a former gangster, stumbles upon a time-travelling phone that can save his estranged mother from a grim fate, but he must navigate through dangerous consequences of altering the past while facing his own family's legacy.

name: Ms Shetty Mr Polishetty
info: While Miss Shetty is a feminist living in London and wants to be single forever, Mr. Polishetty from Hyderabad wants to be in a committed relationship. Despite being in different stages of life, they connect.

name: The Nun 2
info: The sequel to the worldwide smash hit follows Sister Irene as she once again comes face-to-face with Valak, the demon nun.

name: Leo
info: A cafe owner becomes a local hero but his actions being forth consequences from a dangerous world that can shake his carefully constructed life

name: Tiger 3
info: Tiger and Zoya are back - to save the country and their family. This time it`s personal!

name: The Marvels
info: Carol Danvers aka Captain Marvel has reclaimed her identity from the tyrannical Kree and taken revenge on the Supreme Intelligence. But unintended consequences see Carol shouldering the burden of a destabilized universe.

name: 12th Fail
info: Based on Anurag Pathak`s bestselling novel of the same name, 12th Fail depicts the true story of an IPS officer Manoj Kumar Sharma hailing from a small town in Chambal, who fearlessly embraced the idea of restarting his academic journey and reclaiming his destiny at a place where millions of students attempt for the world`s toughest competitive exam, UPSC

name: Maa Oori Polimera 2
info: After a serial spine chilling killings in Adrasupally, an auto driver Komaraih elopes to Kerala with his first love Kavitha. Things get more complicated when his brother Jangiah goes missing.
